channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- network

item.title: CVE-2024-21488|2024-03-06T14:09:56.189Z -- n/a -- network
item.description: Versions of the package network before 0.7.0 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Command Injection due to use of the child_process exec function without input sanitization. If (attacker-controlled) user input is given to the mac_address_for function of the package, it is possible for the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the operating system that this package is being run on.
